title: Bryant McFadden on rookie QBs in NFL preseason, new NFL helmet rule (Football 08/14)
description:
Will Brinson breaks down the latest NFL news and notes from around the league and is then joined by Bryant McFadden of CBS Sports to talk about the league's helmet rule and the problems it's causing, as well as to look at the performances of some rookie quarterbacks around the league.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy

itunes:subtitle: Bryant McFadden joins Will Brinson to talk about the NFL's new helmet rule, its effects and to discuss performances by rookie quarterbacks in the first week of the preseason.
